Your risk of infection depends on the number of bites received, the number of infected deerflies in the area you visit, and the length of your stay in the area.",CDC,Parasites - Loiasis
How to diagnose Parasites - Loiasis ?,"In people who have been bitten by the flies that carry Loa loa in areas where Loa loa is known to exist, the diagnosis can be made in the following ways:
